name: Kash Karnival
description:
Kash Karnival is the world’s first fully licensed real money pure skill gaming app for players who wish to play and win real money on arcade games of skill rather than games of chance. Play games where you are in control, that you can totally dominate. Play now to claim your free Kash Coins!

 Play the real money skill game everyone is raving about.

 Choose from a huge range of skill games in Kash Kingdom to wager, win Kash Coins and CASH OUT! 

  ✦ Play to win with Kash Coins, smash Jackpots, exchange your winnings for cash. The higher you climb the more you win!

✦ Play arcade games in the Booster Zone to win BOOSTER PACKS that provide an added edge to skill games.

✦ Play to earn loyalty Kash Rewards to redeem for real item gift cards and prizes.

✦ EPIC power-ups and ultra-gems to help you smash through levels and win even more.

✦ Join global Tournaments and rank on weekly Leaderboards to win massive prizes and boost your cash wins!

✦ Join our Premium VIP players and unlock even more features and rewards to bring you one step closer to a major cash out!

✦ Play for fun with free zero-dollar bets, while still earning daily rewards.

 Do you have what it takes to tackle the Kash Karnival challenge? Here are a few reasons why u should:

 
You are already playing mobile casual games. Now play the same games and win real cash & prizes.

  • Decide on your own bets to control how much and when you win.
  • We don't believe in static jackpots. The better you are, the more you should win. You can even buy power-ups to help you secure that elusive win!
  • Sure we still gotta make some money, but we are always looking for new rewarding ways for our users to play, have fun and win real cash and rewards.

 Jump into the Karnival. Be entertained and start making some moolah.

 Kash Karnival is a mobile only game. To play & win you must have an active internet and data connection.

 Kash Karnival is intended for use by those aged 18 and over and is for entertainment purposes only. Licensed under the Kahnawake Gaming Commission, Canada.

We are also available on the Apple App Store: https://apps.apple.com/kw/app/kash-karnival/id1021856470
